thread.title: Thomas Muller hilariously reveals how he deals with Bayern Munich's incredible El Rondos
thread.title_full: Thomas Muller hilariously reveals how he deals with Bayern Munich's incredible El Rondos

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Thomas Muller hilariously reveals how he deals with Bayern Munich's incredible El Rondos
text:
Sport Thomas Muller hilariously reveals how he deals with Bayern Munich's incredible El Rondos The German giants are the masters of piggy in the middle - and Muller's had enough of playing Miss Piggy Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Thomas Muller slides in on EVERYONE in Bayern Munich training Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Bayern Munich are known for being quite good at El Rondo (piggy in the middle). 
In fact they're so good we've previously done two separate articles simply raving about how bloody brilliant they are. 
And if there's one thing we've learned from watching all of Bayern's impressive El Rondo drills, it's that you do NOT want to be the man in the middle. 
Which probably explains Thomas Muller 's hilarious and bizarre actions in the video above. Swipe one (Photo: FC Bayern Munich / Youtube) Swipe two (Photo: FC Bayern Munich / Youtube) 
The 27-year-old has simply resorted to slide tackling in every which way possible. 
We assume the thinking process behind this is that the German covers more ground space this way. 
Eventually Muller's technique pays off as he nicks the ball off Robben's toes. poll loading Are you better than Thomas Muller at El Rondo? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
